duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the general administrative support of the Briefing Program team and visiting customers.
Generate reports on briefing metrics and measures.
Maintain inventory of all supplies and customer giveaways.
Provide concierge-style service to all customers, including meeting and greeting customers, and escorting them to their briefing room.
Organize internal meetings and events other than briefings that take place in the Briefing Center.
Coordinate with security and reception desk, and serve as the point of contact for security, facilities, A/V, etc.
Coordinate the ordering of catering for all engagements, including the setup/breakdown and cleanup.
Manage vendor relationships with catering, hotels, transportation, and gifts.
Refresh all marketing collateral and maintain inventory.
Update the briefing schedule on a daily basis and share it with lobby receptionist.
Collect necessary information for customer engagements with the account team, including time, date, catering, hotels, special requests, etc.
Prepare all customer and account team name badges.
Manage pre-engagement arrangements prior to the start of the briefing, including cleaning and setup (meeting logistics – agenda, feedback forms, name tents, badges, A/V setup, pad/pen, etc.).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Hospitality Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
